Figure 1, Figure 2, Figure 3, Figure 4 and Figure 5 show that
B ( v , ϑ
) at ambient temperature and pressure are well represented by Equation (7) (or even Equation (6)), especially in light of the uncertainty in our current model for B, which is hard to quantify. (In our example of nickel, both Equations (6) and (7), yield exactly the same fit for pure edge dislocations, whereas, in the case of screw dislocations, the four-parameter Equation (7) slightly improves an already decent fit by making use of the additional term
